function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in average open space per resident","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to COVID-19 due to limited outdoor space for social distancing and self-isolation","Mitigation":"Increase access to urban green infrastructure and open spaces for socially disadvantaged groups","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, urban planning solutions","People":"Socially disadvantaged groups, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Urban heat island effect as a result of urban densification","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to heat waves and health risks for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement heat-resilient urban planning, green roofs, and cool pavement technologies","Technologies":"Green roofs, cool pavement technologies, urban planning solutions","People":"Vulnerable populations, elderly with pre-existing medical conditions","Owner":"Urban planners, city officials, community organizations"},{"Description":"Link between environmental and socio-demographic factors with increased COVID-19 risk","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission in specific social groups due to environmental and socio-demographic factors","Mitigation":"Targeted public health measures and interventions in high-risk areas","Technologies":"Data analytics, targeted public health interventions","People":"High-risk social groups, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
